steps.title: What is CELO?
steps.text: CELO helps keep the Celo Dollar stable and the Celo Network running.

steps.title: CELOâ€™s price changes
steps.text: Unlike Celo Dollars, the value of CELO changes. If more people use Celo Dollar, the value of CELO increases.

steps.title: Please buy and sell responsibly
steps.text: *Celo* allows you to buy and sell CELO. CELO presents a risk of financial loss so please do so responsibly.
